thread.title: T. Schley
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by T. Schley

author: T. Schley
title: T. Schley
text: They hadnt the boots i liked in the wwaterford store and the sales man promised i could order them and have them next day. even delivered to my own house. was delighted as i needed them for match . He was very helpful finding a boot similar recommending, which size to order. Boots came early next morning and are fab perfect fit. Highly recommend and a great price to. Fab and comfy.
